short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple, beautiful new tab page for chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple new tab provides beautiful images combined with super simple, easy to use controls to give you a peaceful, effortless browsing experience.

Features:
- Random images each time you open a new tab
- Google Search bar
- 24 hour clock
- Notepad that can be saved to local storage

Please install and leave a review!
